item.title: The Morellic Minikin
item.description: Overview The Morellic minikin are an ethnic group of minikin native to southern Tseireph. They originated in the areas north of the Jana mountain range, but would eventually migrate southward.

item.title: The Nethic Minikin
item.description: Overview The Nethic minikin are an ethnic group of minikin native to southern Tseireph. They originated in the southwest, but would go on to migrate throughout the entire continent.
